languages.text: "Сей путь был избран советом, дитя. Мы вели Крударах сквозь звезды множество лет, и никто не подозревал, что за ужасная судьба ожидает наш дом в месте, что пророчило нам спасение".

traits.locale_text: "Сей путь был избран советом, дитя. Мы вели Крударах сквозь звезды множество лет, и никто не подозревал, что за ужасная судьба ожидает наш дом в месте, что пророчило нам спасение".
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: "That was the path chosen by the council, my child. We had charted Crudarach's course among the stars for years, and no one had an inkling of the terrible fate that would await us in the place that promised us salvation."
languages.original_text: "Сей путь был избран советом, дитя. Мы вели Крударах сквозь звезды множество лет, и никто не подозревал, что за ужасная судьба ожидает наш дом в месте, что пророчило нам спасение".

traits.locale_text: "That was the path chosen by the council, my child. We had charted Crudarach's course among the stars for years, and no one had an inkling of the terrible fate that would await us in the place that promised us salvation."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

traits.locale_text: "That was the path chosen by the council, my child. We had charted Crudarach's course among the stars for years, and no one had an inkling of the terrible fate that would await us in the place that promised us salvation."

traits.locale_text: "That was the path chosen by the council, my child. We had charted Crudarach's course among the stars for years, and no one had an inkling of the terrible fate that would await us in the place that promised us salvation."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

traits.locale_text: "That was the path chosen by the council, my child. We had charted Crudarach's course among the stars for years, and no one had an inkling of the terrible fate that would await us in the place that promised us salvation."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

traits.locale_text: "That was the path chosen by the council, my child. We had charted Crudarach's course among the stars for years, and no one had an inkling of the terrible fate that would await us in the place that promised us salvation."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: «Esa fue la resolución que tomó el consejo, hija mía. Habíamos trazado una ruta que llevaría a Crudarach a través de las estrellas durante muchos años, y nadie podía imaginarse el terrible sino que nos aguardaba en el lugar donde creíamos hallar la salvación».
languages.original_text: "That was the path chosen by the council, my child. We had charted Crudarach's course among the stars for years, and no one had an inkling of the terrible fate that would await us in the place that promised us salvation."

traits.locale_text: «Esa fue la resolución que tomó el consejo, hija mía. Habíamos trazado una ruta que llevaría a Crudarach a través de las estrellas durante muchos años, y nadie podía imaginarse el terrible sino que nos aguardaba en el lugar donde creíamos hallar la salvación».
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: 「それが評議会が選んだ道だったのだ、我が子よ。我々は長きにわたって星々の間でクルダラの航路を描いてきたが、救済が約束されし地で恐ろしい運命が待ち受けているとは誰も想像していなかった」
languages.original_text: "That was the path chosen by the council, my child. We had charted Crudarach's course among the stars for years, and no one had an inkling of the terrible fate that would await us in the place that promised us salvation."

traits.locale_text: 「それが評議会が選んだ道だったのだ、我が子よ。我々は長きにわたって星々の間でクルダラの航路を描いてきたが、救済が約束されし地で恐ろしい運命が待ち受けているとは誰も想像していなかった」
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: “这是议会制订的航线，我的孩子。这么多年来，我们绘制了克鲁达拉赫在星际间之间的航线。没有人能想到，这个承诺会给我们带来救赎的地方，等待我们的却是可怕的劫难。”
languages.original_text: "That was the path chosen by the council, my child. We had charted Crudarach's course among the stars for years, and no one had an inkling of the terrible fate that would await us in the place that promised us salvation."

traits.locale_text: “这是议会制订的航线，我的孩子。这么多年来，我们绘制了克鲁达拉赫在星际间之间的航线。没有人能想到，这个承诺会给我们带来救赎的地方，等待我们的却是可怕的劫难。”
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: « Telle était la voie choisie par le conseil, mon enfant. Nous avons passé des années à tracer la voie de Crudarach parmi les étoiles et personne ne se doutait du terrible sort qui nous attendait à l'endroit qui devait pourtant nous offrir le salut. »
languages.original_text: "That was the path chosen by the council, my child. We had charted Crudarach's course among the stars for years, and no one had an inkling of the terrible fate that would await us in the place that promised us salvation."

traits.locale_text: « Telle était la voie choisie par le conseil, mon enfant. Nous avons passé des années à tracer la voie de Crudarach parmi les étoiles et personne ne se doutait du terrible sort qui nous attendait à l'endroit qui devait pourtant nous offrir le salut. »
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: "Für diesen Weg entschied sich der Rat, mein Kind. Wir hatten Crudarachs Kurs durch die Sterne jahrelang geplant, aber niemand konnte auch nur erahnen, welches schlimme Schicksal uns an dem Ort erwarten würde, der uns eigentlich Erlösung bringen sollte."
languages.original_text: "That was the path chosen by the council, my child. We had charted Crudarach's course among the stars for years, and no one had an inkling of the terrible fate that would await us in the place that promised us salvation."

traits.locale_text: "Für diesen Weg entschied sich der Rat, mein Kind. Wir hatten Crudarachs Kurs durch die Sterne jahrelang geplant, aber niemand konnte auch nur erahnen, welches schlimme Schicksal uns an dem Ort erwarten würde, der uns eigentlich Erlösung bringen sollte."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: "Konsey, bu yolu seçti çocuğum. Yıllarca Crudarach'ın rotasını yıldızların arasından geçecek şekilde haritaya döktük. Bize kurtuluş vadeden bu yerde bizi bekleyebilecek korkunç bir kader olduğundan kimsenin en ufak bir kuşkusu yoktu."
languages.original_text: "That was the path chosen by the council, my child. We had charted Crudarach's course among the stars for years, and no one had an inkling of the terrible fate that would await us in the place that promised us salvation."

traits.locale_text: "Bu, konsey tarafından seçilen yoldu çocuğum. Yıllar boyunca Crudarach'ın rotasını yıldızların arasından geçecek şekilde haritaya döktük ve bize kurtuluş vadeden yerde bizi bekleyebilecek korkunç kadere dair kimsenin en ufak bir kuşkusu bile olmadı."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer
